files.description: Setup file for Quran Secrets package. Contains configuration details for packaging and installation of the Quran Secrets application.
List of python package dependencies required by the Quran Secrets application. Contains camel_tools package.
Initialization file for quran_secrets package, used to mark the src directory as a Python package and perform any package-level initializations if required.
Main driver for the Quran Secrets application. Orchestrates reading the Quran text, preprocessing it, and invoking various analysis functions to generate a comprehensive report.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main entry point for the Quran Secrets analysis. It reads the Quran text, preprocesses it, and calls various analyzer and logger functions to produce a final report.

files.description: Module for reading the Quran text from a file. Contains a function to open a file and return its contents, or raise an IOError if the file cannot be read.

functions.name: read_quran_text
functions.description: Read and return the text from the specified Quran file. Raises an IOError if the file cannot be read.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: The path to the Quran text file.

files.description: This module provides functionality for preprocessing and normalizing Arabic text. It includes functions to remove diacritics and normalize specific Arabic letters according to certain rules. The module is designed to standardize Arabic text for further processing in NLP or text analysis applications.

functions.name: remove_diacritics
functions.description: Removes all Arabic diacritical marks (tashkeel) from the input text. These marks include fatha, kasra, damma, sukun, shadda, and other vowel marks that appear above or below letters in Arabic script. The function uses regular expressions to identify and remove these marks.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The original Arabic text containing diacritics that need to be removed.

functions.name: normalize_arabic_letters
functions.description: Normalizes specific Arabic letters in the given text according to contextual rules. It specifically handles two cases: 1) Converting the Arabic letter 'ى' (alef maqsura, U+0649) to 'ي' (yeh, U+064A) only when it appears as a standalone word, and 2) Converting the Arabic letter 'ة' (teh marbuta, U+0629) to 'ه' (heh, U+0647) when it appears at the end of words. This normalization helps standardize text variations that are semantically equivalent in Arabic.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Arabic text to be normalized.

files.description: Module for analyzing the Quran text for hidden patterns, anomalies, linguistic and numerical analyses. It includes functions for text analysis, word frequency, root word extraction, n-gram analysis, verse repetitions, lemma analysis, verse count summary, palindrome detection, Abjad numeral analysis, semantic symmetry, and comprehensive Muqatta'at analysis.

functions.name: analyze_text
functions.description: Analyze the given text for hidden numerical patterns and anomalies. Simulates pattern detection and returns detected anomalies.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed text of the Quran.

functions.name: analyze_word_frequency
functions.description: Perform word frequency analysis on the preprocessed Quran text and flag unusual frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_root_words
functions.description: Extract and count Arabic root words using morphological analysis from the Quran text.

functions.name: analyze_bigrams
functions.description: Generate and count n-grams (default bigrams) from the tokenized Quran text.

parameters.name: tokenized_text
parameters.description: List of preprocessed tokens from the Quran text.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of words in each n-gram (default is 2).

functions.name: analyze_verse_repetitions
functions.description: Analyze verse repetitions within and across Surahs in the preprocessed Quran text.

parameters.name: preprocessed_text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text where each line represents a verse.

functions.name: analyze_lemmas
functions.description: Perform lemma analysis using CAMeL Tools on the tokenized Quran text and return a formatted summary.

functions.name: analyze_surah_verse_counts
functions.description: Analyze the verse counts per Surah in the Quran text and return a summary.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Quran text loaded from the data file.

functions.name: analyze_verse_lengths_distribution
functions.description: Calculate and analyze the distribution of verse lengths per Surah, detecting consistency using a standard deviation threshold.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text where each line represents a verse.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Standard deviation threshold for consistency (default is 2).

functions.name: analyze_palindromes
functions.description: Identify palindromic words and phrases within each verse of the Quran.

functions.name: analyze_abjad_numerals
functions.description: Perform Abjad numeral analysis on the Quran text, calculating numerical sums and detecting notable patterns.

functions.name: analyze_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Analyze semantic symmetry (word overlap) between segments of the Quran text.

functions.name: analyze_verse_length_symmetry
functions.description: Examine the symmetry of verse lengths between the two halves of each Surah.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text with each line as a verse.

parameters.name: avg_threshold
parameters.description: Maximum allowed difference in average verse length (default is 1.0).

parameters.name: stddev_threshold
parameters.description: Maximum allowed difference in verse length standard deviation (default is 1.0).

functions.name: analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Enhanced semantic symmetry analysis using lemma overlap between two halves of each Surah.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text with each line representing a verse.

parameters.name: symmetry_threshold
parameters.description: Minimum normalized overlap to consider significant (default is 0.3).

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat
functions.description: Analyze Muqatta'at by identifying Surahs beginning with mysterious letters and calculating letter frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_preceding_context
functions.description: Analyze the verses preceding Surahs with Muqatta'at and perform word frequency analysis.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_themes
functions.description: Perform thematic analysis for Surahs with Muqatta'at, associating each with a predefined theme.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_context
functions.description: Analyze the verses following Muqatta'at in Surahs and compute word frequency from the context verses.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_positions
functions.description: Analyze the positions of Muqatta'at within their respective Surahs.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_numerical_values
functions.description: Perform numerical analysis specific to Muqatta'at in the Quran text.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_sequences
functions.description: Analyze and count the frequency of Muqatta'at sequences in the Quran text.

functions.name: categorize_surahs_by_muqattaat
functions.description: Categorize Surahs into those with and without Muqatta'at.

functions.name: compare_surahs_muqattaat_vs_non_muqattaat
functions.description: Compare Surahs with and without Muqatta'at by analyzing average verse lengths and top word frequencies.

functions.name: analyze_correlations
functions.description: Analyze correlations across various analytical dimensions of the Quran text.

parameters.name: flagged_words
parameters.description: List of flagged words from frequency analysis.

parameters.name: enhanced_symmetry_data
parameters.description: Results from enhanced semantic symmetry analysis.

functions.name: analyze_muqattaat_distribution_meccan_medinan
functions.description: Analyze the distribution of Muqatta'at in Meccan versus Medinan Surahs using classification data.

parameters.name: surah_classification
parameters.description: Mapping of Surah numbers to 'Meccan' or 'Medinan'.

functions.name: analyze_grouped_root_frequencies
functions.description: Analyze root word frequencies for a specified group of Surahs.

parameters.name: surah_list
parameters.description: List of Surah numbers to analyze.

functions.name: analyze_grouped_lemma_frequencies
functions.description: Analyze lemma frequencies for a specified group of Surahs.

parameters.name: surah_list
parameters.description: List of Surah numbers to analyze.

files.description: Module for logging analysis outputs of the Quran Secrets application. Provides functions to log secret findings, results, and bigram frequencies into a log file with timestamps.

functions.name: log_secret_found
functions.description: Logs a secret finding to the results.log file with a special tag and a timestamp.

functions.name: log_result
functions.description: Logs a result message to the results.log file with a timestamp.

functions.name: log_bigram_frequencies
functions.description: Logs the top N most frequent bigrams to the results log file including header and frequency counts for the top N bigrams.

parameters.name: bigram_frequencies
parameters.description: A dictionary mapping bigram tuples to frequency counts.

parameters.name: top_n
parameters.description: The number of top bigrams to log (default is 20).

files.description: Initialization file for tests directory to mark it as a package and perform any necessary test setup.
Unit tests for the file_reader module that test reading an existing file and handling errors for non-existing files.

classes.name: TestFileReader
classes.description: Unit test class for testing the file_reader module including tests for reading existing files and error handling when files do not exist.

methods.name: test_read_existing_file
methods.description: Test reading an existing file returns correct content.

methods.name: test_read_non_existing_file
methods.description: Test that reading a non-existing file raises an IOError.

files.description: Unit tests for the text_preprocessor module testing the removal of diacritics and normalization of Arabic letters.

classes.name: TestTextPreprocessor
classes.description: Unit test class for the text_preprocessor module, ensuring proper functionality of diacritics removal and Arabic letter normalization.

methods.name: test_remove_diacritics
methods.description: Test removal of Arabic diacritics from text.

methods.name: test_normalize_arabic_letters
methods.description: Test normalization of specific Arabic letters in text.

files.description: Unit tests for the analyzer module. This file contains various test cases to validate the functionality of the analyzer module, including tests for text analysis, word frequency analysis, root word analysis, bigram analysis, palindrome detection, abjad numerals analysis, semantic symmetry analysis, verse repetitions analysis, verse lengths distribution analysis, verse length symmetry analysis, and enhanced semantic symmetry analysis.

classes.name: TestAnalyzer
classes.description: Test suite for the analyzer module, inheriting from unittest.TestCase to provide a structured testing environment. It includes various test methods to verify different functionalities of the analyzer.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Setup method to configure test environment before each test. Sets maxDiff to None for better comparison of large outputs.

methods.name: test_analyze_non_empty
methods.description: Tests analyze_text function with non-empty text input. Verifies that anomalies are detected for non-empty input.

methods.name: test_analyze_empty
methods.description: Tests analyze_text function with empty text input. Verifies that no anomalies are detected for empty input.

methods.name: test_analyze_word_frequency_summary
methods.description: Tests analyze_word_frequency function for summary generation. Checks if the summary and flagged list are correctly generated.

methods.name: test_analyze_word_frequency_with_flags
methods.description: Tests analyze_word_frequency function for flagging unusual word frequencies. Verifies that unusual frequencies are flagged.

methods.name: test_analyze_root_words_empty
methods.description: Tests analyze_root_words function with empty text input. Simulates missing CAMeL Tools and checks for correct handling.

methods.name: test_analyze_root_words_sample
methods.description: Tests analyze_root_words function with sample text and mocked CAMeL Tools. Verifies root word analysis with mocked dependencies.

methods.name: test_analyze_bigrams_empty
methods.description: Tests analyze_bigrams function with empty or insufficient tokens. Checks for empty dictionary return.

methods.name: test_analyze_bigrams_sample
methods.description: Tests analyze_bigrams function with sample tokens. Verifies correct bigram generation and frequency counting.

methods.name: test_analyze_palindromes_detects_palindrome
methods.description: Tests analyze_palindromes function for palindrome detection. Verifies detection of palindromic words and phrases.

methods.name: test_analyze_abjad_numerals_detects_patterns
methods.description: Tests analyze_abjad_numerals function for numerical pattern detection. Verifies detection of notable numerical patterns.

methods.name: test_analyze_semantic_symmetry_detects_symmetry
methods.description: Tests analyze_semantic_symmetry function for symmetry detection. Verifies detection of significant word overlap (semantic symmetry).

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_repetitions
methods.description: Tests analyze_verse_repetitions function. Verifies correct identification of verse repetitions within and across surahs.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_lengths_distribution
methods.description: Tests analyze_verse_lengths_distribution function. Verifies correct calculation of verse length distribution metrics and consistency logging.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_length_symmetry_symmetry_detected
methods.description: Tests analyze_verse_length_symmetry function for symmetry detection. Verifies symmetry detection when verse lengths are similar.

methods.name: test_analyze_verse_length_symmetry_non_symmetric
methods.description: Tests analyze_verse_length_symmetry function for non-symmetry. Verifies non-symmetric result when verse lengths differ significantly.

methods.name: test_analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry_symmetry_detected
methods.description: Tests analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry function for symmetry detection. Verifies semantic symmetry detection based on lemma overlap.

methods.name: test_analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry_low_symmetry
methods.description: Tests analyze_enhanced_semantic_symmetry function for low symmetry. Verifies low symmetry score when lemma overlap is minimal.

methods.name: test_analyze_muqattaat_preceding_context
methods.description: Tests analyze_muqattaat_preceding_context function. Verifies extraction of preceding context verses and frequency analysis.

files.description: This file contains unit tests for the logger module. It tests the functionality of logging secret findings and general results. The tests use unittest framework with mocking to isolate the tests from actual file operations and datetime dependencies.

classes.name: TestLogger
classes.description: A test class that contains test cases for the logger module. It verifies that the logging functions correctly format and write messages to the log file.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes the test environment by setting maxDiff to None to see full diff output in case of test failures.

methods.name: test_log_secret_found
methods.description: Tests that the log_secret_found function correctly formats and writes a message about a potential secret to the log file. It mocks the datetime and file operations to verify the exact output.

parameters.name: mock_datetime
parameters.description: Mocked datetime module to provide a fixed timestamp

parameters.name: mock_file
parameters.description: Mocked file open function to capture file writes

methods.name: test_log_result
methods.description: Tests that the log_result function correctly formats and writes a general result message to the log file. It mocks the datetime and file operations to verify the exact output.

parameters.name: mock_datetime
parameters.description: Mocked datetime module to provide a fixed timestamp

parameters.name: mock_file
parameters.description: Mocked file open function to capture file writes

files.description: Integration test suite for the main module of the Quran Secrets application. This test file includes a class `TestMainIntegration` that contains integration tests to verify the end-to-end functionality of the application. It tests scenarios with and without CAMeL Tools availability, ensuring fallback mechanisms work correctly. The tests cover the main analysis pipeline, log file generation, and the comparative analysis functions.

classes.name: TestMainIntegration
classes.description: Test cases for end-to-end integration of the Quran Secrets application.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Set maximum diff for assertions.

methods.name: test_main_integration_fallback
methods.description: Test the full execution of main() function end-to-end with CAMeL Tools fallback.

methods.name: test_main_integration_with_camel_tools
methods.description: Test the full execution of main() function end-to-end with CAMeL Tools available.

methods.name: test_compare_surahs_muqattaat_vs_non_muqattaat
methods.description: Test the compare_surahs_muqattaat_vs_non_muqattaat() function for correct categorization and analysis.

files.description: Text file containing the Quran text. This file is used as input for the analysis performed by the Quran Secrets application.
